content.raw:
As I understand it, `unique_ptr`s cannot be used with derived classes because they can't be casted. See the example in rendering of `Visual`->`AxisVisual`->`LinkFrameVisual`. I asked @nkoenig about it and he suggested a combination of unique and shared pointers for inheritance.

I think it would be a nice idea to write a design document with guidelines so we have consistency throughout Gazebo.
